# Packets
Below is a list of all packets that are used in the Skyline protocol. Along with their corresponding ID and direction. If you would like to learn more about that packet, please click on the packet name.

| Packet | ID | Direction | Description |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| [LoginRequest](#login-request) | 0x00 | Client -> Server | Used to identify a client to the server. |

## Login Request
Used to identify a client to the server.

| Field | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| `token` | `string` | The token used to identify the client. |
